summary.para: Contains flags that specify whether the Media Engine will play protected content, and whether the Media Engine will use the Protected Media Path (PMP).

remarks.para: These flags are used with the MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CONTENT_PROTECTION_FLAGS attribute.

summary.para: Enable playback of protected content. The Media Engine will not play DRM-protected content unless this flag is set. If you set this flag, also set the MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CONTENT_PROTECTION_MANAGER attribute.
Use the Protected Media Path (PMP) for all playback, including clear (non-protected) content.
Create the PMP inside an unprotected process. You can use this option to play clear content, but not to play protected content.
